## R Markdown

```{r}
library(tidymodels)
library(ISLR) # For the Smarket data set
library(ISLR2) # For the Bikeshare data set
library(corrr)
library(corrplot)
tidymodels_prefer()
```

For this example, we'll take a look at the `Default` data, which comes with the `ISLR` or `ISLR2` package.
```{r}
Default %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = default)) +
  geom_bar()
```
